data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Throw-in for Sassuolo in their own half.
In the minute 4, Alexis Sanchez puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
Lautaro Martinez with an assist there.
Throw-in for Inter close to the penalty box.
In the minute 6, Can Inter capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sassuolo's half?
Throw-in for Inter in the half of Sassuolo.
Ivan Perisic for Inter drives towards goal at Mapei Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 7, Massimiliano Irrati signals a Inter throw-in in Sassuolo's half.
Sassuolo to take a throw-in in Inter territory.
Free kick Sassuolo.
In the minute 11, Inter's Lautaro Martinez misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Reggio Emilia.
Inter awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 14, Corner awarded to Inter.
Own goal! Vlad Chiriches scores in his own net to make it 0-2.
Ball safe as Inter is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 17, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Massimiliano Irrati signals a free kick to Inter in their own half.
Lautaro Martinez (Inter) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 20, Free kick for Inter in their own half.
Filip Djuricic gets his shot on target but fails to score for Sassuolo.
Ball goes out of play for a Inter goal kick.
In the minute 22, Sassuolo have been awarded a corner by Massimiliano Irrati.
Inter awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Massimiliano Irrati signals a free kick to Inter in their own half.
In the minute 26, Inter are pushing forward but Arturo Vidal's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Sassuolo at Mapei Stadium.
Massimiliano Irrati signals a free kick to Sassuolo.
In the minute 28, Inter needs to be cautious. Sassuolo have an attacking throw-in.
Inter awarded a free kick in their own half.
Massimiliano Irrati awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 33, Can Sassuolo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Inter's half?
Throw-in for Inter at Mapei Stadium.
In Reggio Emilia Sassuolo drive forward through Rogerio. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 36, Free kick for Sassuolo in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Sassuolo in Reggio Emilia.
Sassuolo have been awarded a corner by Massimiliano Irrati.
In the minute 38, Sassuolo drives forward and Jeremy Toljan gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Free kick for Inter in the half of Sassuolo.
Inter have a goal kick.
In the minute 41, Lautaro Martinez of Inter gets in a strike, but is off target.
Massimiliano Irrati awards Sassuolo a goal kick.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Vlad Chiriches.
In the minute 42, Vlad Chiriches (Sassuolo) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Marlon.
In Reggio Emilia a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In Reggio Emilia a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 44, Giacomo Raspadori (Sassuolo) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Reggio Emilia.
Jeremie Boga of Sassuolo is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 45, Throw-in Sassuolo.
The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Free kick for Sassuolo in their own half.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half is now underway.
Corner awarded to Sassuolo.
In the minute 49, Inter awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Mapei Stadium, Manuel Locatelli has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Massimiliano Irrati signals a free kick to Sassuolo in their own half.
In the minute 52, Massimiliano Irrati signals a free kick to Inter in their own half.
Free kick for Inter in the half of Sassuolo.
Inter are coming forward and Lautaro Martinez gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 54, Sassuolo have a goal kick.
Inter awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Massimiliano Irrati signals a free kick to Sassuolo.
In the minute 56, Sassuolo push forward at Mapei Stadium and Gian Marco Ferrari gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Inter defence.
Ball goes out of play for a Inter goal kick.
Massimiliano Irrati waits before resuming play because Rogerio for Sassuolo is still down.
In the minute 57, Rogerio for Sassuolo has been booked by Massimiliano Irrati and receives a first yellow card.
Sassuoloâ€™s Rogerio is on his feet again at Mapei Stadium.
Throw-in for Inter in the half of Sassuolo.
In the minute 59, Roberto De Zerbi is making the team's second substitution at Mapei Stadium with Pedro Obiang replacing Filip Djuricic.
The home team replace Jeremy Toljan with Mert Muldur.
Goal! Inter extend their lead to 0-3 through Roberto Gagliardini.
In the minute 60, Matteo Darmian instrumental with a fine assist.
Important block from the Inter defence as Manuel Locatelli fires in a strike for Sassuolo.
Corner awarded to Sassuolo.
In the minute 66, Inter have a dangerous throw-in.
Massimiliano Irrati blows against Inter's Alexis Sanchez for offside.
Free kick for Inter in their own half.
In the minute 66, Maxime Lopez (Sassuolo) gets a yellow card.
Inter's Alexis Sanchez breaks free at Mapei Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Sassuolo at Mapei Stadium.
In the minute 68, Ball safe as Inter is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Sassuolo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sassuolo are coming forward and Domenico Berardi gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 71, Massimiliano Irrati awards Inter a goal kick.
Free kick for Sassuolo in their own half.
Massimiliano Irrati signals a throw-in for Sassuolo, close to Inter's area.
In the minute 72, Throw-in high up the field for Sassuolo in Reggio Emilia.
Massimiliano Irrati signals a Sassuolo throw-in in Inter's half.
Sassuolo to take a throw-in in Inter territory.
In the minute 76, Free kick in a good position for Sassuolo!
Hamed Junior Traore is replacing Giacomo Raspadori for the home team.
Nicolas Schiappacasse is on a sub for Maxime Lopez for Sassuolo.
In the minute 79, Massimiliano Irrati signals a free kick to Inter in their own half.
Inter make their first substitution with Romelu Lukaku replacing Lautaro Martinez.
The away team replace Alexis Sanchez with Ashley Young.
In the minute 80, Free kick Sassuolo.
Ivan Perisic is booked for the away team.
Throw-in for Inter in their own half.
In the minute 82, Inter have been awarded a corner by Massimiliano Irrati.
Inter drive forward but Romelu Lukaku is judged offside.
Christian Eriksen is replacing Ivan Perisic for the away team.
In the minute 85, Inter make their third substitution with Stefano Sensi replacing Nicolo Barella.
Sassuolo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sassuolo drive upfield and Jeremie Boga gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Inter defender.
In the minute 89, Corner awarded to Sassuolo.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Sassuolo have been awarded a corner by Massimiliano Irrati.
Sassuolo are pushing forward but Hamed Junior Traore's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Inter goal kick.
Full-time! The final score is 0-3.
Achraf Hakimi is on a sub for Matteo Darmian for Inter.
